group.label: API settings
group.comment: Go to the general settings in the back office of MyParcel to generate the API Key.

field.label: API key
field.tooltip: The API Key

field.label: Import MyParcel Backoffice settings
field.tooltip: Clicking this button will fetch settings from the MyParcel Backoffice and overwrite the current settings.

field.label: Delivery costs json object
field.tooltip: If you leave this empty or invalid, this shipping method will act as Flat rate using the Shipping cost defined under Sales->Delivery Methods->MyParcel

field.label: Show delivery date
field.tooltip: Show a delivery date in the checkout.

field.label: Number of days
field.tooltip: Amount of days in the future customers can choose from in the checkout.

field.label: Drop-off delay
field.tooltip: This options allows you to set the number of days it takes you to pick, pack and hand in your parcels when ordered before the cutoff time.

field.label: Mode
field.tooltip: With 'Export entire order', MyParcel will export every order in its entirety to the back office for further processing.

field.label: Paper type
field.tooltip: Select a standard orientation for printing labels.

field.label: Label description
field.tooltip: This description will appear on the shipment label. The following parts can be used: %order_nr%, %delivery_date%, %product_id%, %product_name%, %product_qty%.

field.label: Country of origin
field.tooltip: This country will appear on the international consignment labels. This is where your products are shipped from. You can use NL, BE, DE etc. This will be overridden by country of manufacture on product level.

field.label: Create Concept
field.tooltip: Enable create label concept, when invoice is printed.

field.label: I use the following weight type
field.tooltip: This is the type of weight that I use with my products.

field.label: Preferred pickup locations view
field.tooltip: When pickup locations are enabled, the user can choose between map or list view. This setting decides which option will be selected first, upon opening the pickup locations.

field.label: Price shown in delivery options
field.tooltip: This determines the way the price of delivery is shown to the customer through the delivery options. The price can be shown as a total for each delivery option or as a surchage on top of the regular shipping price.

field.label: Standard delivery Title
field.tooltip: The times will be visible when nothing is filled in

field.label: Home address only title
field.tooltip: The times will be visible when nothing is filled in

field.label: Morning title
field.tooltip: The times will be visible when nothing is filled in

field.label: Evening title
field.tooltip: The times will be visible when nothing is filled in

field.label: Monday delivery
field.tooltip: Delivery on monday may require special conditions compared to other (week)days including but not limited to fee and cutoff time.

field.label: Monday delivery fee
field.tooltip: This will be added to the regular shipping price

field.label: Signature on receipt fee
field.tooltip: This will be added to the regular shipping price

field.label: Receipt code fee
field.tooltip: This will be added to the regular shipping price

field.label: Home address only fee
field.tooltip: This will be added to the regular shipping price

group.label: Drop-off days
group.comment: Specify the days you hand in your parcels for this carrier. Specify the latest time a customer can order for you to deliver the package in time for shipment that day.

field.label: Monday
field.tooltip: Whether you drop off packages on this day.

field.label: Cut-off time
field.tooltip: For orders before this time, the drop-off is considered done on this day.

field.label: Tuesday
field.tooltip: Whether you drop off packages on this day.

field.label: Cut-off time
field.tooltip: For orders before this time, the drop-off is considered done on this day.

field.label: Wednesday
field.tooltip: Whether you drop off packages on this day.

field.label: Cut-off time
field.tooltip: For orders before this time, the drop-off is considered done on this day.

field.label: Thursday
field.tooltip: Whether you drop off packages on this day.

field.label: Cut-off time
field.tooltip: For orders before this time, the drop-off is considered done on this day.

field.label: Friday
field.tooltip: Whether you drop off packages on this day.

field.label: Cut-off time
field.tooltip: For orders before this time, the drop-off is considered done on this day.

field.label: Saturday
field.tooltip: Whether you drop off packages on this day.

field.label: Cut-off time
field.tooltip: For orders before this time, the drop-off is considered done on this day.

field.label: Sunday
field.tooltip: Whether you drop off packages on this day.

field.label: Cut-off time
field.tooltip: For orders before this time, the drop-off is considered done on this day.

group.label: Default shipping options
group.comment: Fill in your preferences for a shipment. These settings will only apply for the mass actions in the order grid. When creating a single shipment, these settings can be changed manually. These settings will activate based on the order total amount.

field.label: From price
field.tooltip: 'Signature on receipt' operates above a certain order total amount

field.label: From price
field.tooltip: 'Home address only' operates above a certain order total amount

field.label: From price
field.tooltip: 'Return if no answer' operates above a certain order total amount

field.label: From price
field.tooltip: 'Large format' operates above a certain order total amount

field.label: Automate 'Age check 18+'
field.tooltip: The age check is intended for parcel shipments for which the recipient must show 18+ by means of a proof of identity. With this shipping option Signature on receipt and Home address only are included. The age 18+ is further excluded from the delivery options morning and evening delivery.

field.label: Insure orders from (€)
field.tooltip: The minimum amount from when insurance is active.

field.label: Insure orders up to
field.tooltip: This setting applies to domestic shipments only

field.label: Insure orders up to (BE)
field.tooltip: A custom be insurance price within a range of possibilities.

field.label: Insure orders up to (EU)
field.tooltip: A custom eu insurance price within a range of possibilities.

field.label: Insure orders up to (ROW)
field.tooltip: A custom row insurance price within a range of possibilities.

field.label: Insure orders for percentage
field.tooltip: Use percentage of total order amount for insurance. After the calculation, the next available price scale is selected.

field.label: Automate digital stamp
field.tooltip: Select automatically digital stamp packages based on weight

field.label: Default weight
field.tooltip: Price depends on the weight. Are the weights correctly filled in for all products? Choose 'No standard weight' to let MyParcel calculate the weight itself. Select a standard weight here when the products do not contain correct weights.

field.label: Automate mailbox
field.tooltip: Select automatically mailbox packages based on weight or volume

field.label: Mailbox weight
field.tooltip: To use this optimally, set a weight or 'Fit in mailbox' volume of each product. Regardless, shipments heavier than the weight specified here will not be mailbox.

field.label: International mailbox
field.tooltip: Only available for certain contracts. If this is not in your contract, the setting has no effect.

field.label: Automate Small Package
field.tooltip: Automatically select package type 'Small Package' for orders under 2000 grams. Package type will be 'Small Package' when a product has setting 'Fit in mailbox' set to 0 and the weight is under 2000 grams.

field.label: Small Package weight
field.tooltip: Shipments heavier than the weight specified here will not be of package type 'Small Package'.

field.label: Morning delivery active
field.tooltip: If age check is active then the morning delivery is not possible

field.label: Morning delivery fee
field.tooltip: This will be added to the regular shipping price

field.label: Evening delivery active
field.tooltip: If age check is active then the evening delivery is not possible

field.label: Evening delivery fee
field.tooltip: This will be added to the regular shipping price

field.label: Pickup fee
field.tooltip: Enter an amount that is either positive or negative. For example, do you want to give a discount for using this function or do you want to charge extra for this delivery option.

field.label: Signature on receipt fee
field.tooltip: This will be added to the regular shipping price

field.label: Home address only fee
field.tooltip: This will be added to the regular shipping price

group.label: Drop-off days
group.comment: Specify the days you hand in your parcels for this carrier. Specify the latest time a customer can order for you to deliver the package in time for shipment that day.

field.tooltip: For orders before this time, the drop-off is considered done on this day.

field.tooltip: For orders before this time, the drop-off is considered done on this day.

field.label: Saturday
field.tooltip: Whether you drop off packages on this day.

field.label: Cut-off time
field.tooltip: For orders before this time, the drop-off is considered done on this day.

field.label: Sunday
field.tooltip: Whether you drop off packages on this day.

field.label: Cut-off time
field.tooltip: For orders before this time, the drop-off is considered done on this day.

group.label: Default shipping options
group.comment: Fill in your preferences for a shipment. These settings will only apply for the mass actions in the order grid. When creating a single shipment, these settings can be changed manually. These settings will activate based on the order total amount.

field.label: From price
field.tooltip: 'Signature on receipt' operates above a certain order total amount

field.label: From price
field.tooltip: 'Home address only' operates above a certain order total amount

field.label: Automate 'Age check 18+'
field.tooltip: The age check is intended for parcel shipments for which the recipient must show 18+ by means of a proof of identity. With this shipping option Signature on receipt and Home address only are included. The age 18+ is further excluded from the delivery options morning and evening delivery.

field.label: Automate 'Hide sender'
field.tooltip: Activating the 'hide sender' option will remove the name and address of the sender from the label

field.label: Insure orders from (€)
field.tooltip: The minimum amount from when insurance is active.

field.label: Insure orders up to
field.tooltip: This setting applies to domestic shipments only

field.label: Insure orders up to (BE)
field.tooltip: A custom be insurance price within a range of possibilities.

field.label: Insure orders for percentage
field.tooltip: Use percentage of total order amount for insurance. After the calculation, the next available price scale is selected.

field.label: Automate mailbox
field.tooltip: Select automatically mailbox packages based on weight or volume

field.label: Mailbox weight
field.tooltip: To use this optimally, set a weight or 'Fit in mailbox' volume of each product. Regardless, shipments heavier than the weight specified here will not be mailbox.

field.label: Pickup fee
field.tooltip: Enter an amount that is either positive or negative. For example, do you want to give a discount for using this function or do you want to charge extra for this delivery option.

field.label: From price
field.tooltip: 'Signature on receipt' operates above a certain order total amount

field.label: From price
field.tooltip: 'Home address only' operates above a certain order total amount

field.label: Insure orders from (€)
field.tooltip: The minimum amount from when insurance is active.

field.label: Insure orders for percentage
field.tooltip: Use percentage of total order amount for insurance. After the calculation, the next available price scale is selected.

field.label: Express delivery active
field.tooltip: UPS guarantees delivery within one day with this option active.

field.label: Express delivery fee
field.tooltip: This will be added to the regular shipping price

group.label: MyParcel Track
group.comment: Enable this option to add the MyParcel barcode in the email.

field.label: MyParcel Shipment Email Template
field.tooltip: Use Shipment email template when "Default" option is selected.

field.label: MyParcel Shipment Email Template for Guest
field.tooltip: Use Shipment email template when "Default" option is selected.
